H0.text: Which Italian demonstrated the first modern electric battery. Luigi Galvani

H1.text: Which Italian demonstrated the first modern electric battery. Giovanni Battista Beccaria

H2.text: Which Italian demonstrated the first modern electric battery. Felice Fontana

H3.text: Which Italian demonstrated the first modern electric battery. Alexander Volta

A4.text: Volta invented the voltaic pile in 1799

A5.text: Volta was invited to the Institute of France to demonstrate his invention to the members of the institute
